channel.title: Why Moparscape Fails
channel.description:
[b]HANDLERS[/b] - this term is by far one of the most idiotic things i have witnessed in my years here. Please for the love of god stop making static classes and adding a call to that method in your "process()" method, you are solving Nothing.
[b]CLIENT.JAVA[/b] - this term is used as if its a object, its nothing more than a name please stop asking for other peoples "client.java" this also goes for any class name such as "class8.java" "class9.java" and so on. 9/10 it will not work for you because everyone programs differently.
[b]Server Restarters[/b] - fucking fail nothing more.
[b]ANY SERVER THAT IS NOT USING RS2Dv OR SOMETHING ORIGINAL [/b] EVERY BASE BEFORE RS2Dv should be deleted.
[b]ANY QUESTIONS SILAB CLIENT RELATED[/b] SilabClient is made of fail i suggest using your own works.
[b]Any tutorials in the tutorial section [/b] If they do not teach something worthwhile disregard it. if they are "source specific" they are made of fail. A tutorial should only teach a way you could implement something, Not hold your hand and tell you "the only way" it should be done.
[b]FREESMF[/b] NEED I SAY MORE! MORE FAIL TO COME WHEN I FEEL LIKE RANTING AGAIN!

item.title: Why Moparscape Fails
item.dc:creator: @The_Un-Named The Un-Named
item.description:
@The_Un-Named wrote:

can i hav ur client.java

item.description:
@silabsoft wrote:

HANDLERS - this term is by far one of the most idiotic things i have witnessed in my years here. Please for the love of god stop making static classes and adding a call to that method in your “process()” method, you are solving Nothing.

CLIENT.JAVA - this term is used as if its a object, its nothing more than a name please stop asking for other peoples “client.java” this also goes for any class name such as “class8.java” “class9.java” and so on. 9/10 it will not work for you because everyone programs differently.

Server Restarters - fucking fail nothing more.

ANY SERVER THAT IS NOT USING RS2Dv OR SOMETHING ORIGINAL EVERY BASE BEFORE RS2Dv should be deleted.

ANY QUESTIONS SILAB CLIENT RELATED SilabClient is made of fail i suggest using your own works.

Any tutorials in the tutorial section If they do not teach something worthwhile disregard it. if they are “source specific” they are made of fail. A tutorial should only teach a way you could implement something, Not hold your hand and tell you “the only way” it should be done.

FREESMF NEED I SAY MORE!
MORE FAIL TO COME WHEN I FEEL LIKE RANTING AGAIN!
